column5: If your gonna hold a photo op, make sure someone shows you how to use the props!    http://communities.canada.com/nationalpost...-adventure.aspx
I don't get it.
.....He's a holding the rod handle behind the reel Dan, a definite no-no in my books.
Vladimir joins our stable of topless fishers.  Nips in the sun.
Hey, at least he is not holding it upside down..... that really drives me crazy....  Burt
LOL, nice hold? Kind of looks like a young GCD?
He's trying out his personal hero, the Green Coach Dog look. We need to photoshop a wall in there somewhere....maybe even a Twinkie or two. Oh and a blue cat would look nice.
That boy is so white he could almost be from Thunder Bay!

he was also holdingthe reel  upside down along with other brain children in his enterouge in some pictures, the rod still has plastic on the handle what a geek nothing worse then leaving the cover on your cork
Russian reelette...what a sport....

I sometimes hold the rod that way too....but only when my index finger cramps up and I have to change positions for a minute or two.  I also sometimes hold the reel upside down....but that's only when I use someone else's setup.  I'm a right hand retrieve and most people reel with their left.

These days you need plastic on your cork for protection.....some of those rod holders can be rough.   Ever see George Bush run a chain saw? Now thats scary.  Someone should tell him you don't have to pull it back and forth.
You hold rod funny....I must crush you!!  I find this picture distrubing on many levels.

Reminds me of this this past Saturday. I wasted 30min of my life watching one of the girls on Shelly and Courtney complain on how she can't use a spinning reel.  As for Putin, if it works for him, who's to care? Some of the pictures in that gallery were actually quite nice.  Anyone up for a steelheading road-trip to the Kamchatka region?
Did someone tie you down, glue your eyes open, turn on S&C and take away your remote control?
Hows this Roy?? Not the best photoshop, and i dont even know if catfish the size of shark jump...  He's got quite the tattoo those    Corey
Oh sure. Now you tell me....
That'll be enough of that young man!!!
It's never warm enough to fish topless in Thunder Bay GCD. Well, maybe for a day or two a year.
Cliff isd one of the few who people who are right handed and fishes left handed, but He does catch some really nice fish that way.
:D  Ummm...........wait, hold it just a gol' dern minute there????????????
